info.+content: Kidō Senshi Gundam Senkō no Hathaway
機動戦士ガンダム 閃光のハサウェイ

U.C. 0105 - twelve years after the Second Neo Zeon War, the peace on Earth and its colonies is disrupted by "Mafty", a terrorist organization bent on preventing the Earth Federation from privatizing the Earth to the privileged. Hathaway Noa, who has been living in the shadow of his father Colonel Bright Noa all his life, befriends a mysterious woman named Gigi Andalucia after thwarting a hijacking by Mafty forces. The Federation, however, is unaware of Hathaway's ulterior motives.
『機動戦士ガンダム 閃光のハサウェイ』公式サイト
